info: The Project will help increase living standards and reduce poverty in the project area by removing a transport constraint to sustainable economic growth, and improve safety and reliability by introducing new and modern technology. This will be achieved by providing efficient, affordable, environment-friendly, and energy-efficient railway transportation in unserved, less developed areas to create the conditions necessary for developing local resources and generating employment and income-enhancing opportunities.
name: CHONGQING-LICHUAN RAILWAY DEVELOPMENT PROJECT
